definition: Guatemala/see also 瓜地馬拉|瓜地马拉[Gua1 di4 ma3 la1]
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: In the jungles of 1)Guatemala, in Tikal, stands a temple.
sentences.chinese: 在危地马拉丛林深处的蒂卡尔，矗立着一座神庙。

sentences.english: Torre if elected would become the first female president of Guatemala.
sentences.chinese: 托雷如果当选将成为危地马拉首名女总统。

sentences.english: A woman prepares pinatas at a factory in Guatemala City.
sentences.chinese: 危地马拉市一名妇女在工厂上准备着彩饰陶罐。

sentences.english: It is bordered by the United States on the north and by Guatemala and Belize on the south.
sentences.chinese: 北与美国接攘，南与中美洲的危地马拉和贝利兹相邻。

sentences.english: The state is weak, even by Latin American standards.
sentences.chinese: 即使用拉丁美洲的标准衡量，危地马拉积弱难返。

sentences.english: They owned vast banana plantations in Guatemala and Central America.
sentences.chinese: 他们在危地马拉和中美洲拥有广大的香蕉大种植园。

sentences.english: 56% of all Guatemalans live in poverty.
The shootings unnerved the most powerful members of Guatemalan society.
sentences.chinese: 枪杀让危地马拉社会最有权势的人物都感到紧张不安。

sentences.english: It is located in the archaeological region of the Petén Basin in northern Guatemala.
sentences.chinese: 它位于危地马拉北部皮腾盆地的考古地区。

sentences.english: Two countries, Guatemala and Surinam, were declared mine-free.
sentences.chinese: 危地马拉和苏里南这两个国家声称没有地雷。

sentences.english: I lost my family while in Guatemala.
sentences.chinese: 在危地马拉，我失去了家庭。

sentences.english: During the trip there was also a violent anti-American demonstration in the capital.
sentences.chinese: 在此期间，危地马拉首都出现了一个暴力反美集会。

sentences.english: Those icky sheets in a Guatemalan hotel room? Turns out that I didn’t have to touch them.
sentences.chinese: 那些在危地马拉宾馆里黏黏的被单，我其实不必碰它。

sentences.english: On Feb. 14, Guatemalans exchange flowers, chocolates and cards.
sentences.chinese: 危地马拉人互赠鲜花，巧克力和卡片。

sentences.english: In the jungles of Guatemala, in Tikal, stands a temple.
sentences.chinese: 在危地马拉的丛林深处的提卡尔，矗立着一座神庙。

pinyin: Duo1 mi3 ni2 jia1 Gong4 he2 guo2
